author: Special Correspondent
title: Home delivery helpline to service many areas in south Bengaluru
description: Authorities estimate that 2.5 lakh households are likely to benefit from this
content:
If all goes as planned, shopping for essential items, including medicines, will be just a phone call away for residents of Jayanagar, Basavanagudi, Padmanabhanagar, and Chickpet. 
To improve the efficacy of the lockdown and ensure that people are not compell… [+1413 chars]
